rationale: Describes the severity/scale of an event ('worst bird flu crisis ever', 'nearly 50 million poultry culled', 'raised the risk'), not capability/preparedness.
statement_text: PARIS Europe has experienced its worst bird flu crisis ever this year with nearly 50 million poultry culled, and the persistence of the virus over the summer has raised the risk of widespread infections next season, the EU's Food Safety Agency (EFSA) said.
